thread.title: Customer rick boucher
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Customer rick boucher

author: Customer rick boucher
title: Customer rick boucher
text: parts missing, I got a incomplete quick disconnect kit. I feel that I should get all the parts I paid for and not have to call and recall to get the missing parts replaced and sent. after all paying all most $500.00 for bags and disconnect mounting kit. then I sent an email asking about discounts, as I bought the bags and disconnect kit on presidents day and got no response. maybe after I get all the parts and mount the bags my review might be different.
